citations.narrative:
A current record of guinea pigs was not available for review during this inspection. A total of 422 guinea pigs including
adults, weanlings and newborns were counted during this inspection. There were no inventory records indicating the
number of adult guinea pigs, weanlings, or newborns present for several months or the number of guinea pigs which died.
The last calendar entry was back in May 2023, which listed the number of weanlings present.
Failure to maintain these records can make it difficult to assess the health of the caviary by identifying animal losses by
death or decreased numbers of animals born, and to track animals being sold in regulated activities to ensure their
humane care. The licensee must maintain records containing the required information for animals which fully and correctly
disclose the number of guinea pigs held, owned, acquired, or disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by August
10, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
A current record of guinea pigs was not available for review during this inspection. A total of 422 guinea pigs including 
adults, weanlings and newborns were counted during this inspection. There were no inventory records indicating the 
number of adult guinea pigs, weanlings, or newborns present for several months or the number of guinea pigs which died. 
The last calendar entry was back in May 2023, which listed the number of weanlings present.  
 
Failure to maintain these records can make it difficult to assess the health of the caviary by identifying animal losses by 
death or decreased numbers of animals born, and to track animals being sold in regulated activities to ensure their 
humane care. The licensee must maintain records containing the required information for animals which fully and correctly 
disclose the number of guinea pigs held, owned, acquired, or disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by August 
10, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
